description.narrative: Government at national and sub-national level have strengthened capacity for evidence based policy development, multi sectoral coordination, planning, budgeting, implementation, monitoring and evaluation for nutrition.

sector.narrative: Data, research, evaluation, evidence generation, synthesis, and use for prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition
National multisectoral strategies and plans to prevent stunting (excludes intervention-specific strategies)
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
Technical assistance - Prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Afghanistan (Adolescent Health and Development)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government at national and sub-national level have strengthened capacity for evidence based policy development, multi sectoral coordination, planning, budgeting, implementation, monitoring and evaluation for nutrition.

description.narrative: UNICEF has adjusted to key changes in government and with COVID context by supporting initiatives to guide services delivery adaptation in technical areas ensuring continuation of services for women and children, enhancing information and supply systems, improving the enabling environment, and generating evidence on interventions to improve service delivery quality. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/07/2020

title.narrative: Existence of a functional national multisectoral committee for nutrition
Existence of revised national nutrition policies, strategies and guidelines
Percentage of severe acute malnutrition supplies [Ready for Use Therapeutic Food (RUTF)] procured through national (on) budget
Existence of national nutrition annual report using number of evaluation and studies conducted that provide evidence in nutrition (BNA, SMART, RNA, WIFS, CBNP, IMAM)
Existence of a national management information system that includes disaggregated data on nutrition, including sex-disaggregated data
